title: Qrysis/PROXY - [Team AMA]

replies.body: How are your powerful friends doing?
replies.body_tagged: How are your powerful friends doing?

replies.body:
Opinions or maybe first impressions of the fine city of Singapore based on what you know?
So would you visit Singapore if you had the choice?

Opinions on the Badlion Kohi merge?

Opinions on Donald Trump being uncontested? Who do you think will win on the Democrats side?

How does one control emotions that arise from shitty internet?

Describe where you live and how life is

Why do you play Avicus? How did you start playing Avicus? OCN or Avicus?

How do you think the world will end? 

Do you believe Minecraft can be an e-sport? What are your opinions on the competitive side of Minecraft as of now?

What do you think makes a good leader IN GENERAL? Certain qualities?

Opinions on your own team, how far you have come and improved

Opinions on Avicus, it's current state and maybe how it can improve. What do you think of the competitive scene as of now? Will the new tournament revive it? or will it remain dead?

Do you approve of relationships online? So what are your opinions on Zero and CatCutie? :PPPPPPPP

Last of all, most original question ever,  opinions on me, both as a player and as a person, and how I am able to improve in whatever aspect mentioned.

How do you think the world will end? 

Do you believe Minecraft can be an e-sport? What are your opinions on the competitive side of Minecraft as of now?

What do you think makes a good leader IN GENERAL? Certain qualities?

Opinions on your own team, how far you have come and improved

Opinions on Avicus, it's current state and maybe how it can improve. What do you think of the competitive scene as of now? Will the new tournament revive it? or will it remain dead?

Do you approve of relationships online? So what are your opinions on Zero and CatCutie? :PPPPPPPP

Last of all, most original question ever,  opinions on me, both as a player and as a person, and how I am able to improve in whatever aspect mentioned.

replies.body:
1) Now nothing about it
2) Would visit
3) I got unbanned from Badlion, so idc :P
4) I try to not give a shit about the US election xD
5) Punch Tazz
6) I live in a small town in a part of Canada [Nova Scotia]. Life here is great, it's pretty calm :)
7) I did play Avicus because of my friends, and I joined because of walls. OCN, because I like to be very  competitive
8) I don't know tbh
9) Not really, and I like were the competitive side is headed
10) I know when to take charge, my team looks up to me a lot during scrims, and not during scrims. We've worked on communication and they now to do something when I say it. A leader is only as good as his team.
11) I think we've come really far, considering at the start no one really knew each other and we kind of just played.
12) No Comment
13) Banter :P
14) It depends, and Zero and Cat are cute af <3 ;P
15) You're an amazing player! and a really good person as well. I loved having you on my team for Mega scrims, or just playing with you in public matches, I wouldn't change anything about you my lil lagger :P
replies.body_tagged:
1) Now nothing about it

3) I got unbanned from Badlion, so idc :P
4) I try to not give a shit about the US election xD
5) Punch Tazz
6) I live in a small town in a part of Canada [Nova Scotia]. Life here is great, it's pretty calm :)
7) I did play Avicus because of my friends, and I joined because of walls. OCN, because I like to be very  competitive
8) I don't know tbh
9) Not really, and I like were the competitive side is headed
10) I know when to take charge, my team looks up to me a lot during scrims, and not during scrims. We've worked on communication and they now to do something when I say it. A leader is only as good as his team.
11) I think we've come really far, considering at the start no one really knew each other and we kind of just played.
12) No Comment
13) Banter :P
14) It depends, and Zero and Cat are cute af <3 ;P
15) You're an amazing player! and a really good person as well. I loved having you on my team for Mega scrims, or just playing with you in public matches, I wouldn't change anything about you my lil lagger :P

replies.body:
Opinions on the Badlion Kohi merge? Great because I play lots of badlion and suck at my kohi, though i am a good uhc/sg player

Opinions on Donald Trump being uncontested? Who do you think will win on the Democrats side? I am not sure though I do want Hillary or someone on the Democrats to win

How does one control emotions that arise from shitty internet? I honestly have no clue, rage hard and then go outside play soccer?

Describe where you live and how life is: I live in Canada, Ontario a place where many and many canadians live and really nice people live, also very diverse cultures.

Why do you play Avicus? How did you start playing Avicus? OCN or Avicus? So I always enjoyed Avicus more than ocn tho i do like ghost squadron, i enjoy the community plus the better lag here

How do you think the world will end? God kills us all duh

Do you believe Minecraft can be an e-sport? What are your opinions on the competitive side of Minecraft as of now?
I believe it can like what we made here is e-sport similar so minecraft to soon be e-sports, we might see that in the future
What do you think makes a good leader IN GENERAL? Certain qualities? Knowing the right strats and being strict such as when we versed CBT in tourney ryan wasn't as strict of a leader as if we were to say dawson

Opinions on your own team, how far you have come and improved: we almost beat CBT without dawson enough said

Opinions on Avicus, it's current state and maybe how it can improve. What do you think of the competitive scene as of now? Will the new tournament revive it? or will it remain dead? Maybe a new tourney?

 So what are your opinions on Zero and CatCutie? :PPPPPPPP Not sure but it doesn't seem to be working out but i honestly have no clue

Last of all, most original question ever,  opinions on me, both as a player and as a person, and how I am able to improve in whatever aspect mentioned. Your a great pvper on a great team, though u hate what ever i say usually. Your a nice guy though, haven't screamed much with u tho so not sure

replies.body:
Opinions or maybe first impressions of the fine city of Singapore based on what you know? I got nothing, its far away, thats my impression.
So would you visit Singapore if you had the choice? Why not

Opinions on the Badlion Kohi merge? I dont really care, I dont know how to pvp

Opinions on Donald Trump being uncontested? Who do you think will win on the Democrats side? I about to move out of america.  Probably Hilary......

How does one control emotions that arise from shitty internet? You can't control it.

Describe where you live and how life is: I live in the state of virginia, its pretty good, lots of nature, beaches, mountains, forestry, the greatest place for camping.

Why do you play Avicus? How did you start playing Avicus? OCN or Avicus? Because of friends who play.  I wanted to play walls.  Avicus :P

How do you think the world will end? Trump will cause the death of us all

Do you believe Minecraft can be an e-sport? What are your opinions on the competitive side of Minecraft as of now? Ummmm Not sure.  Avicus and OCN are the best competitive servers, most of everything else is garbage.

What do you think makes a good leader IN GENERAL? Certain qualities? Devotion, charisma and understanding of his subordinates.

Opinions on your own team, how far you have come and improved: Qrysis has definitely improved, but inactivity has hurt us recently, and a certain person getting banned has not helped either xD

Opinions on Avicus, it's current state and maybe how it can improve. What do you think of the competitive scene as of now? Will the new tournament revive it? or will it remain dead?  Needs to fix bugs and focus on making good gameplay maps.  Its growing, more teams are appearing, I don't know if the tournament will revitalize it that much but it will probably help.  

Do you approve of relationships online? So what are your opinions on Zero and CatCutie? :PPPPPPPP I think that's stupid in most cases, I don't know who CatCutie is but good for zero.

Last of all, most original question ever,  opinions on me, both as a player and as a person, and how I am able to improve in whatever aspect mentioned.  Your pretty cool, I havent chatted with you personally, because we are on opposite sides of the earth.  Havent seen you play so i cant help you there :I
